# Introduction

Molecular biology is **cool** because:

- It tries to understand how life really works
- Because of it, we can now develop targeted therapies to human diseases.
- It also enables us to do interesting things like expressing a human protein in bacteria.

> “All approaches at a higher level are suspect until confirmed at the molecular level.”
>
> Francis Crick
